p:
According to the literature, latent and infectious stages do not typically last for more than a week [ 38– 41, 43], while human—based on Reunion Island population [ 38]—and vector [ 44] susceptibilities were estimated to be higher than 50%. Although the posterior mode Q
I covers a wide range of biologically plausible parameter configurations, the dataset δ
I does not impose strong restrictions on most of the parameters.
